about_the_game:
Dive into a surreal world of horror, comedy, delicious dinners and time-twisting mysteries in Owl Observatory, a classic point-and-click adventure and prequel to cult-favorite Dinner with an Owl.

Story

Enter the enigmatic mansion of Mr. Virgil Brooks, a peculiar owlish gourmet who predicts the imminent end of time.
Play as Tycho Brahe, the famed astronomer with the golden nose, and unravel the dark secrets lurking within the mansion and its eccentric residents.
Time is slipping away — or is it?

Utilize your abilities wisely:

  • Travel through time
  • Clone yourself for devious deception - But make sure that the clones never meet each other!
  • Hypnotize the vulnerable minds

Features:

  • Immerse yourself with full professional voice acting
  • Navigate a twisted, looping storyline
  • Be captivated by an eerie original soundtrack
  • Reconnect with familiar faces from Dinner with an Owl and meet new strange characters
  • Easy to use two-button interface
  • Optional hotspot highlighting



Eternity begins now - at the Owl Observatory!
Are you ready for the unexpected?

name: Owl Observatory Demo
short_description: Embark on a surreal, time-looping journey in this horror comedy point-and-click adventure with a delicious twist. Eternity begins now: At the Owl Observatory!
